Once, the Buddha was staying at the Kalanda Bamboo Grove in Rajagriha.

This is the true essential.

Having cut off these three bonds, one attains the fruit of stream-entry, does not fall into bad destinies, is definitely headed for full enlightenment, is reborn in the heavens and among humans seven times, and finally puts an end to suffering. This is called being swift.
What is meant by not being complete in form?

If one is asked about abhidharma and the precepts, but is unable to explain them in full with complete phrases and meanings, in sequence and in accordance with the Dharma, this is called not being complete in form.
What is meant by not being complete in body?
Not being of great virtue and fame, yet able to obtain robes, food and drink, bedding, and medicine, this is called a person who is swift but not complete in appearance and form.
What is meant by being complete in swiftness, complete in appearance, but incomplete in form?

It means a person who truly knows this suffering, this origin of suffering, this cessation of suffering, and this path leading to the cessation of suffering, and thus ultimately reaches the end of suffering, this is being complete in swiftness.
What is meant by being complete in appearance?
If asked about Abhidharma and the precepts, and is able to explain them, this is called being complete in appearance.
What is meant by being incomplete in form?
Not being of great virtue and fame, yet able to obtain robes, food and drink, bedding, and medicine, this is called a person who is swift but not complete in appearance and form.
What is meant by a man being fully endowed with swiftness, fully endowed with color, and fully endowed with bodily form?

It means that a man truly knows this suffering, this origin of suffering, this cessation of suffering, and this path leading to the cessation of suffering, and thus reaches the ultimate end of suffering. This is called being fully endowed with swiftness.
What is meant by being fully endowed with color? If one asks about Abhidharma and the precepts, and is able to explain them, this is called being fully endowed with color.

What is meant by being fully endowed with bodily form? Having great virtue and fame, and obtaining bedding, hot water, and medicine, this is called being fully endowed with bodily form. These are called a man being fully endowed with swiftness, fully endowed with color, and fully endowed with bodily form.
